entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as a teacher who is cold and menacing. He is described as looking more menacing than ever.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher who lacks organization.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is introduced as a student who boldly defends Professor Lupin.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student watching Snape teach the class.

entities.name: red caps
entities.description: Red Caps are mentioned as creatures that first years should be able to deal with.

relationships.description: Snape and Lupin have a disagreement about the organization of the class.
Dean Thomas supports Professor Lupin by defending him against Snape's criticism.
